metadata.name: Flower arc
metadata.description:
We believe that the world is going well and that tomorrow morning will be the same, but surprisingly, everyone is living in a random way and there is no consistency in their lives.
I strongly imagined that the world is full of discrepancies in our perception of normalcy.
To create the illusion that the parts fit well together, I gave a distortion to the visual by not making the circle a regular circle.
 (Picture by Hori)

I arranged the sounds while imagining that the world, like a factory or a cogwheel, is spinning in the name of society, repeating the same cycle day after day.
The rising and setting of the sun expresses the passage of time as if it were a matter of course, through the movement of the melody.
In the last part of the piece, where the sounds collide with each other, I imagined the stress of people working in society bursting out.
I hope you can experience a little dark distortion of the world through these colorful pictures. (Music by coco)
